== Ubuntu Open Hardware ==

In the course of releasing and testing the Ubuntu distribution, a need arose for some custom hardware to be used in QA automation.

In the spirit of Ubuntu, the required hardware was developed as an open hardware project, and released under the Apache 2.0 license.

Ubuntu Open Hardware Projects:

* <nowiki>[[OHW-VgaSwitch|VGA Switch]]</nowiki>
